materials.raw_text:
16 g Barium (Ba) 
 1 g Calcium (Ca) 
 3 g Gadolinium (Gd) 
 1 g Molybdenum (Mo) 
 3 g Technetium (Tc)

preparation.raw_text:

 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine 16 g of Barium, 1 g of Calcium, 3 g of Gadolinium, 1 g of Molybdenum, and 3 g of Technetium. 
 3. Using a spatula, mix the powders thoroughly for at least 10 minutes to ensure an even distribution of components.

1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature.
